author: makortel
body:
Fixes the `invalid reference` exception from MultiTrackValidator in wfs 500207.0, 250207.0.

Tested in CMSSW_7_5_X_2015-05-07-1100 with limited matrix + wfs 500207.0, 250207.0. No changes expected in results.
title: Fix associationMapFilterValues() for empty input AssociationMap
